section.heading: Appointment and duties of Consumer and Family Affairs Officer.
section.text: The Department shall have a Consumer and Family Affairs officer, appointed by the Director, and qualified by experience and training to carry out the following functions:

para.text: Ensuring the involvement of consumers of mental health services and their family members in the design, implementation, and evaluation of mental health services and mental health supports;
Serving as a liaison to consumers of mental health services and their family members and personal representatives; and
Promoting the protection of the rights of consumers of mental health services.
